statements: DELETE FROM tumors WHERE tumor_id = 1 AND tumor_size > 5.0;
DELETE FROM tumors WHERE tumor_type = 'Malignant' OR (tumor_size >= 2.0 AND tumor_location LIKE '%brain%');
DELETE FROM Treatment_Plans WHERE patient_id = 100 AND plan_date = '2022-06-15';
DELETE FROM Tumor_Characteristics WHERE patient_id = 5 AND tumor_type = 'Benign';
DELETE FROM TumorImages WHERE patient_id = '98765432-1111-2222-3333-123456789ABC' AND tumor_size > 5;
DELETE FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE patient_id = 123 AND plan_id = 456;
DELETE FROM ImageAnalysis WHERE analyst_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND analysis_date < '2022-01-01';
